title: Racing two of the most powerful e-bikes
description: Super73 and Juiced are two California companies that make super-fast, moped-style e-bikes that are incredibly popular right now. We thought it would be interesting to take two of their highest spec models  Super73s RX and Juiceds HyperScrambler 2  and see how they stack up against each other. And of course, we raced them too. Which do you think won?
